briefdescription.para: Returns an entry_ref for a given path.

parameterdescription.para: The path name referring to the entry.
The entry_ref structure to be filled in.
A (non-leaf) path component does not exist.

briefdescription.para: Returns whether an entry is less than another.

detaileddescription.para: The components are compared in order device, directory, name. A NULL name is less than any non-NULL name.

briefdescription.para: Provides the BEntry class and entry_ref implementations.
